mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.price, p.category, p.stock, p.description, p.created_at, p.updated_at, pi.image_id, pi.image_path, pi.sort_order, pi.created_at AS image_created_at, pi.updated_at AS image_updated_at FROM product p LEFT JOIN product_image pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY pi.sort_order ASC
